title: Memorabilia mundi, or, Choice memoirs of the history and description of the world by G.H.
author: G. H.
publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by F. Smiih [i.e. Smith] ...,
notes: Variously attributed to G. Hooker and G. Hussey. Cf. BM; Wing (2nd ed.); NUC pre-1956.
This work is found at reel 107:10 attributed to G. Hooker, and at reel 498:22 attributed to G. Hussey. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
